newsitem.title: BRAZIL: Chilean foreign minister to visit Brazil.
newsitem.headline: Chilean foreign minister to visit Brazil.

text.p: Chilean Foreign Minister Jose Miguel Insulza will hold talks in Brasilia next week on his country's relations with Brazil, the Foreign Ministry said on Friday.

The ministry said in a statement that Insulza would hold talks with President Fernando Henrique Cardoso, Mines and Energy Minister Raimundo Brito, Foreign Minister Luiz Felipe Lampreia and other government officials.
Chile is an associate member of the Mercosur trade bloc comprising Brazil, Argentina, Uruguay and Paraguay.
